name: The Puzzle Chambers
description:
You find yourself in a dungeon where your only option is to keep moving forward. The puzzles in this dungeon are not entirely straightforward, maybe even outright lies. This is a very short game with just a few puzzle rooms.

*There's currently a bug at the end where you can't actually get to the win screen. But once you reach the stairs you've won. Or falling through the map is just the last lie. 

Link to GitHub: https://github.com/Jarellh94/CommunityGameJam

I had a lot of fun working on this game and learned some things I will use in future projects. Thank you for checking out my submission.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift- Sprint
  • LMB - Interact
  • ESC - Free Mouse

My excuses for the state of this game:

  • I had a tough time coming up with a theme, and then puzzle ideas.
  • This is was my first attempt at a first person game.
  • I had to juggle this Game Jam with taking care of a newborn baby.
